The `unhighlighted_colour` argument of `gghighlight()` is deprecated as of gghighlight 0.2.0.
Please use the `unhighlighted_params` argument instead.
[90mThis warning is displayed once every 8 hours.[39m
[90mCall `lifecycle::last_warnings()` to see where this warning was generated.[39m

Error: No layer can be used for labels
[90mRun `rlang::last_error()` to see where the error occurred.[39m
